Reviews.Content: beautiful hotel fantastic location clean comfortable cosy staff pleasant helpful professional smile attentive whim delicious breakfast fresh plentiful food quality lovely swimming pool bar music reasonable prise highly recommended

Reviews.Title: “Like sleeping on Concrete”
Reviews.Author: BelindaB81
Reviews.Content: arrived airport pick 45 minutes late clean buffet breakfast special beds worst beds ive slept sleeping concrete booked website 3 months prior double bed self partner coarse disappointment twin beds website booking option book swimming pool free arrived reception pick option confirm bookings 2 days response book return transfer airport pulled file free swimming pool reciept upset didnt bother stayed hotels instanbul mistake choosing hotel plus street markets borek corner die

Reviews.Content: value hotel comfortable clean quiet breakfast buffet excellent staff helpful lost atm card gentleman reception dialled contact bank roof pool addition location near sultanahmet bazaars

Reviews.Title: “BEWARE OF THE SCAM - ZAGREB INSTANBUL”
Reviews.Author: THEWALS_10
Reviews.Content: prepaid accommodation hotel prepared told electrical transferred 4 star hotel happened 2 seperate occassions 4 star hotel 1 star dive believe accepting money selling whist transferring cheap hotel 2nd occassion fuss reception desk magically found hotel lovely breakfast warned pre pay accommodation hotel photos comparing 2 hotels

Reviews.Title: “Everything OK, if only they hadn't doublebooked!”

Reviews.Content: stayed hotel august 2010 4 days fine food service reception location bit tram station 5 minutes walk mid summer sun easy taxis wont heavy traffic streets double sent hotel day 2nd hotel pleasant experience assured ok day returned hotel told didnt hotel noisy conversation extra bed day tomorrow ok day changed bigger extra bed instead normal bed expect triple verbal fight changed bed offered free access pool sauna turkish bath dont hope bad handling unfortunate situation wont thats bad hotel deserved review
